message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to me is at least $1200000. I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1200000 for the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a new price of $1350000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to me. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1250000 for the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest counteroffer. I'm still willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. Considering your offer of $1250000, I'm willing to reduce my price to $1300000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for your efforts in negotiating. I would like to counter with an offer of $1275000 for the product.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, and I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach a deal. Considering your latest offer of $1275000, I'm willing to reduce my price to $1290000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in reaching a compromise. I would like to counter with an offer of $1285000 for the product.
